pullrequest.title: Adapt sdformat to debian packaging policy

content.raw:
You are not escaping the dot in the extension properly.
Also, you may want to relax a bit the archive extension (uscan behaves correctly if the same release is available in different formats):

`http://gazebosim.org/assets/distributions/sdformat-(\d\.\d\.\d)\.(?:zip|tgz|tbz|txz|(?:tar\.(?:gz|bz2|xz)))`

See https://wiki.debian.org/debian/watch/
